name: Chainlink Paqi
description: Chainlink Paqi is one NFT of Super Paqi Currencies. Super Paqi Currencies is an 8-bit series of avatars that embody one of the top twenty cryptocurrencies, by market cap, at the time the NFT is minted. Chainlink Paqi is one of the four NFTs released in the first series. To learn more about the Super Paqi Currencies project, visit https://paqi-aysia.github.io/.
